issue.title: [CF 585] Death Knight Runes
issue.body:
Playing around with runes on my dk I've found several possibilities for enhancement.

a) There doesn't seem to be a way to tell if a rune is going to be a death rune before it's actually ready.

b) The cooldown of a rune can't be compared to a number. With spell cooldowns you can check if they're >< x seconds. With runes you can't.

c) With patch 5.0.4. there have come quite a few new abilities with extra charges. I don't know if it's OmniCC or Blizzard but you may be familiar with how the first charge of those abilities has the normal grey cooldown sweep, then the second one has a golden one and a small number indicates the number of available charges. I think it'd be pretty neat if the same could be done with runes if multiple runes are checked.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #585 | Raw

comments.body:
Better late than never? Done in r783. Or at least something similar to this.

  • Rune icons can now distinguish between checking normal runes and death runes
  • Rune icons have an option to show extra unusable runes as charges.

I did #c. #a & #b will just have to be done with a rune cooldown icon + an icon shown condition if you need these in conditions.

Edited Apr 20, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
